name: Cavern Rescue - UDC Game Jam 17 Version
name_original: Cavern Rescue - UDC Game Jam 17 Version
description: Farmer Jack's chickens have got themselves lost in the caves below his farm, can you rescue them all before their air runs out? Read the instructions in game for more info. Put together in the span of 5 days for the Unity Developer Community Game Jam (17) , the levels will loop once you reach the end.
